duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform month-end accounting activities, including journal entries, accruals, and account reconciliations.
Provide monthly standard reporting and ad-hoc analysis of freight and distribution results.
Review and propose changes to financial analysis procedures and processes, leveraging reporting and analysis systems.
Prepare and coordinate monthly forecast submission and reporting.
Coordinate financial planning process for Freight and Distribution, analyze budgets, and prepare periodic reports.
Provide financial documentation for internal audit procedures at distribution centers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
